ygData.subject: does anyone else have problems..
ygData.msgSnippet: with a voodoo3 3000? I have spent hours in tech support trying to get this ressolved but kept getting booted out to server select or desktop while waiting my
ygData.messageBody:
with a voodoo3 3000?
I have spent hours in tech support trying to get this ressolved but kept
getting booted out to server select or desktop while waiting my turn and
losing my place in line..
My computer screen freezes up at random during eq. I took all of the advice
suggested to remedy the situation. I even tested the card in another
computer and it had the same problem.
Anyone else have a voodoo3 3000?
luv,
-Su
